summary: FIT AMIGO fitness platform with FiTube (video platform), Running Monitor (GPS tracking), and Food Tracker (manual search and logging with Nutritionix API)
architectural_notes: Nutritionix API integration for nutritional data lookup
Food diary system with daily macro tracking (calories, protein, carbs, fat)
Manual food search and logging functionality
known_issues: AI camera-based food recognition deferred to future phase due to complexity

existing_features.title: Create a Food Tracker page at /food route that displays a food diary showing all logged foods with nutritional breakdown (calories, protein, carbs, fat in grams) and a daily macro tracking summary showing total calories, protein, carbs, and fat
Create an Add Food page with a search interface where users can search for foods by name, select from search results, specify serving size, and log the food entry
Create React Query hooks for food operations including searching foods via Nutritionix API, logging food entries, and retrieving user's food diary
Add Food Tracker navigation link to the main Navigation component alongside existing features (Store, FiTube, Workout, Running)

new_feature_requests.summary: Food Tracker with manual search and logging (Nutritionix API integration)
Implement backend methods to store food entries with fields for food name, calories, protein, carbs, fat, serving size, and timestamp, and retrieve all food entries for the authenticated user
Integrate with Nutritionix API to search for foods by name and fetch detailed nutritional data including calories, protein, carbs, and fat in grams
